content.title: Thank You for Your Support ‚Äì Product Updates & Delivery Schedule
content.creator:
LinknLink Pty Ltd
March 2, 2025
content.content:
Dear Supporters,
Thank you very much for your enthusiastic support of our crowdfunding project! It is your encouragement and trust that enable us to continuously improve our product and strive to deliver a better user experience.
If you have any new ideas or requirements, please feel free to leave a comment. We are eager to listen and do our best to meet your expectations.
To further enhance the performance and compatibility of our product, we have carried out two rounds of hardware iteration upgrades during the crowdfunding period:
We redesigned and tested the 60GHz mmWave radar module antenna to improve overall performance.
To support Matter, HomeKit, and SmartThings, we upgraded the original Realtek 8720CF WiFi chip to Realtek 8720CM, and increased the available chip memory to 4MB.
While these upgrades have significantly enhanced the functionality of our product, they have also led to some delays in our development progress. The good news is that we have now completed the prototyping phase, and our supply chain team is working closely with our manufacturing partners in China to expedite the production testing process. Due to the impact of these hardware upgrades, the original delivery schedule set for the end of March will be delayed by approximately three weeks. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your understanding.
Once again, thank you for your support and patience. We will continue our efforts to bring you an even better product and experience. Please stay tuned for further updates‚Äîwe will share the latest progress with you as soon as possible!
Sincerely,
The Project Team

comments.text: Is the BLE hub limited to 2 devices? Could I connect other, non-LinknLink BLE devices?

Hi Martin, The eMotion Ultra can connect to a maximum of 30 BLE devices, but these devices must be from LinknLink. Unfortunately, BLE does not currently have a unified smart home standard, so it‚Äôs not a matter of us not wanting to ensure compatibility‚Äîit‚Äôs simply a limitation that no one can overcome at this time. content.title: Technology Upgrade Announcement: eMotion Ultra Adopts 2nd-Gen mmWave Radar Module
content.creator:
LinknLink Pty Ltd
January 23, 2025
content.content:
Dear Pledgers and Smart Home Enthusiasts,
Over the past few months, our team has made comprehensive improvements, refining everything from the antenna‚Äôs physical design to the signal processing architecture. Today, we are excited to introduce the eMotion Ultra will be powered by the 2nd-Gen 60GHz mmWave radar module, expertly designed by the LinknLink team!
The upgrade from our 1st-Gen 60GHz mmWave Radar technology focuses on optimizing antenna design and enhancing transmission efficiency.
Technical Improvements:
Antenna Optimization: The new 2T2R antenna design reduces signal scattering, suppresses multipath interference, and improves weak signal detection at long distances. It maintains a ¬±60¬∞ beam angle, with better sensitivity at the edges.
Increased Power Efficiency: The effective radiated power (ERP) is increased by 20%, while maintaining 12dBm transmission power. A stable power supply ensures consistent performance even in fluctuating conditions.
Co-optimized Algorithms and Hardware: Upgraded signal processing algorithms accurately identify static and micro-motion targets, while dynamic interference shielding filters out fixed interferences. The low-power mode reduces consumption to 2.5mA during idle times.
Test Results: Internal tests show a 7-meter detection range with 98% accuracy for static targets, outperforming the first-gen model in complex environments.
Commitment: eMotion Ultra is a hardware upgrade and a step towards smarter, seamless interaction. We‚Äôll continue to improve the product with future OTA updates. Thank you for your support - eMotion Ultra is nearing mass production, promising an enhanced smart experience.
Best Regards
LinknLink Team
